name: Moonrider
tag_list: ios, mobile, interactive, engine, audio, apple, integrated, experiential, innovative, innovation, technology, creativity, creative, advertising, digital, platform, platforms, design, internet, mobile-internet, digital-solutions, applications
overview: Launched in 2011, Moonrider is the developer of Art Jamâ„¢, a unique, interactive platform that transforms the way custom graphics (such as artwork and images) and audio content (such as music, voices and sound effects) are used to create fun experiences on tablets and other touch-screen devices. Art Jam can be licensed for the development of stand-alone mobile applications or integrated into existing technology platforms, including within e-books, newspaper and magazine apps and as mobile rich media ad units.
